title: Hypermedia Online Learning and Self-Regulated Learning Strategies for Medical Continuing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Knowledge and Experience with Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Hypermedia learning environment design using self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies for office/administrative professionals in mobile settings. Measures learning outcomes through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can achieve weekly learning objectives at over 80% proficiency by applying self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies in hypermedia environments.
Learners can create self-directed learning plans utilizing hypermedia resources (videos, quizzes, case studies, etc.) in digital device-supported environments.
Learners can submit deliverables applying acquired medical knowledge to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
